Author: SubBiscuit
Text: You should eat a small amount of something because the crazy hunger from fasting will likely trigger another binge.  Restricting but still consuming something can help break the binge fast cycle.  Also look into harm reduction - things like electrolytes and multi vitamins.  I know binges can be emotionally hard but it was just one day, you've got this.

Author: n0tmiki
Text: eat light if you feel the need to, but please donâ€™t starve yourself. you are worthy of food and you deserve to eat. xo
